Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: patients with NDRP with a KRAS G12C mutation who have experienced disease progression after at least one line of previous use
PICOs.Outcomes: overall response rate (ORR), progression-free survival (PFS), overall survival (OS), disease control rate (DCR), quality of life

PICOs.Outcomes: progression-free survival (PFS), overall response rate (ORR), disease control rate (DCR), quality of life
